notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: MAMG designed the study, analyzed the results, interpreted papers, and was a major contributor in the writing of the manuscript. MAPH made the statistical calculations and wrote the manuscript. AR and CT contributed to the interpretation of the results and writing of the manuscript. CDSR, MCLM, CCS, ESMA, ERS, AF, RORR and FPL worked through the experiments. RMRN, PCS, LCAJ and RVC revised the manuscript. AMBF coordinated the study. All authors contributed intellectually to the article. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
